title: Don't change icon
body:
Could you please NOT change the icon on every update?
Since the app doesn't have a proper notification system, I have another code that regularly checks the icon and if it looks like there's a red notification number on it, sends me a signal.
Every time you change the icon or the location of the red dot, it breaks my system.

Here are some examples of the changes you make:
